name: Tomb of Friends +
description:
TOMB OF FRIENDS +!!!
An improved version of the "classic" game from the year 28117.

In Tomb of Friends +, journey with Rob, Meg and Oz into a mysterious temple full of weird people who simply want to be your friends.
Or do they....?
Nah, they do.
Make friends, unlock secrets, analyze lore, and have a swell time in this super unique adventure videogame software!

~DO WE HAVE FEATURES?~
You bet we do.
  • 3 playable Characters!!!
  • So many friends you couldn't count them on two hands
  • Secrets? We got secrets
  • "Jokes"
  • COLLECTIBLES
  • 2 pretty large side games you can play if you want
  • Weird random stuff may happen every once in a while???
  • Gremlin mariachis!!!!!!!!!!

"WAIT!!!!! WHAT ARE THE SIDE GAMES!?!?!??!???!!????"
I'm glad you asked.

RONK PING SCRUMP FIGHTERS
Outsmart your opponents in intense fast paced deckbuilding battles! You can also send your decks over to your actual real life friends and see how their decks square up against yours!!!

TRAILVANIA
Manage your resources, make important choices and help Batty survive the cruel world around him, so that he may finally reach his beloved soon-to-be wife Dracula-chan!

SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR........... Um.... Please buy this game I am starving
